api.label: API Key
api.placeholder: Insert your Google Gemini API Key here

error.api: Please insert a valid Gemini API Key

instructions.title: How to get your API Key
instructions.step2: Sign in with your Google account
instructions.step3: Click on "Get API Key" in the left sidebar
instructions.step5: Follow the instructions and once done press "Create key"
instructions.step6: Click on the newly created key and copy your "API Key"

scheduledCommands.title: Scheduled Commands
scheduledCommands.subtitle: Manage your scheduled commands. You can view and cancel pending timers.
scheduledCommands.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this scheduled command?

error.noapi: Gemini API key not found in settings
error.noimage: No image provided. Please drag an image token to this action.
error.multipleimages: Only one image is currently supported. Please provide a single image.
error.rate_limit_exceeded: You have exceeded your daily quota. Please try again later or upgrade your plan. For more information on this error, head to: https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/rate-limits. To monitor your current usage, head to: https://ai.dev/rate-limit.
error.content_blocked: Content blocked by safety filters. Please try rephrasing your request. For more information, visit: https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/safety-settings.
error.api_key_invalid: Invalid API key. Please check your Gemini API key in the app settings. For more information, visit: https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/api-key.

scheduled_commands.limit_exceeded: Scheduling limit exceeded. Maximum delay is 24 days.
